document.full_text: federal reserve chairman ben bernanke signaled on wednesday that the u.s. central bank is in no rush to scale back its support for the economy with the labor market still in a "very, very deep hole."
document.title: bernanke signals no rush to reverse stimulus
lines_and_colors: federal reserve chairman ben bernanke signaled on wednesday that the u.s. central bank is in no rush to scale back its support for the economy with the labor market still in a "very, very deep hole."
